name: Finn the Human
details: Finn is a silly kid who wants to become a great hero one day. He might not look too tough, but if there's evil around, he'll slay it. That's his deal.

name: Jake the Dog
details: Finn's best friend is a wise, old dog with a big heart. Jake has the magical ability to stretch and grow. When evil's not running amok, he plays viola with his girlfriend, Lady Rainicorn.

name: Ice King
details: Armed with a magic crown and an icy heart, the Ice King has only one goal: to secure a wife by any means necessary.

name: Princess Bubblegum
details: As a millionaire nerd enthusiast, Princess Bubblegum immerses herself in every branch of geekdom from rocket science to turtle farming.

name: Lady Rainicorn
details: Lady is Princess Bubblegum's loyal and majestic pet. Her love of the viola makes her a perfect match for Jake.

name: Marceline
details: Marceline is a wild rocker girl. Centuries of wandering the Land of Ooo have made her a fearless daredevil.

name: Lumpy Space Princess
details: Lumpy Space Princess comes from the cloud-like kingdom of Lumpy Space. She acts like a typical spoiled teenager.

name: Beemo
details: Beemo is much more than just Finn and Jake's roommate. Beemo is also their friend, camera, alarm clock and video game system.

name: Gunter
details: Gunter is the name the Ice King gives to all of his penguin servants, yet he pronounces it differently depending on the penguin's personality.

name: Earl of Lemongrab
details: The Earl of Lemongrab is the high-strung, stubborn ruler of the land of Lemongrab, and heir to the Candy Kingdom. He was the first of Princess Bubblegum's experiments gone wrong.

name: Flame Princess
details: Flame Princess is a hot-headed princess from the Fire Kingdom and Finn's new crush.  Her flame powers are tied to her emotions, and she's been known to anger quite easily.

name: Peppermint Butler
details: Peppermint Butler is an inhabitant of the Candy Kingdom and loyal butler to Princess Bubblegum. He has a mysterious past and an undefined relationship with Death.

name: Fionna
details: An alternate, female version of Finn, Fionna the human is just as brave, adventurous and awesome as her male counterpart as she faces off against her enemy, the Ice Queen.

name: Cake
details: Cake the cat is an alternate, female version of Jake. She has similar powers that let her stretch, bend and morph her body, and her boyfriend is Lord Monochromicorn.

name: Me-Mow
details: Me-Mow is a tiny but dangerous cat from the Guild of Assassins who tried to take out Wildberry Princess in order to be made a full member assassin.

name: Tree Trunks
details: Tree Trunks is an elephant friend of Finn and Jake who speaks with a gentle, Southern drawl and lives in the Candy Kingdom. She loves picking apples and making apple pies.

name: Candy People
details: Candy People explode when they are frightened, and they are also very gullible. They live in the candy kingdom.

name: PRINCE GUMBALL
details: This alternate version of Princess Bubblegum is the beloved ruler of Candy Kingdom. He enjoys baking, and riding his trusty steed, Lord Monochromicorn.

name: MARSHALL LEE
details: Marshall Lee is the boy version of Marceline. He's a rockstar vampire king, and one bad little boy.
